products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block:
N | DEG & MEG TANK
N1 | MEDIUM VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with wet pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic type.
150 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: assembly: wet pilot trim, included: strainer, included: drain valve, included: pressure gauge, included: pressure switch, included: flame proof 3/2 way solenoid valve, included: air filter regulator, included: manual release unit, type: electro-pneumatic

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block:

N1 | MEDIUM VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, installation, testing & commissioning of CS Gate Valve as per API 600, class 150 with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.
150 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: cs(carbon steel), standard: API 600, class: 150, included: matching flanges, included: nuts & bolts

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block:
N | DEG & MEG TANK
N1 | MEDIUM VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications
150 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: C Class(Heavy Class), standard: IS 1239, fittings: threaded or grooved, included: elbow, included: tee, included: reducer, included: welding flanges, included: clamps, included: MS brackets/hangers, included: steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, requirement: fire authorities, application: above ground pipes

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block:
N | DEG & MEG TANK
N1 | MEDIUM VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
150 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: IS 1239 Part-1, fittings: elbows, fittings: tees, fittings: flanges, fittings: reduces clamps, fittings: MS support dash fasteners, painting: two coats approved primer, painting: two coats approved paint, joints: grooved with groove coupling, civil work: vendor's scope
